about_the_game:
This DLC provides the 18+ hentai scenes that complete the experience of Lucky Teacher’s romance. This feature automatically unlocks as you progress through the story. You can also access these scenes again via Gallery in the main menu.

Features:
  • Beautiful girls in Live2D animations.
  • Each girl will have her own Hentai Scenes.
  • The scenes include vanilla content with some light fetish elements, excluding BDSM or violence.
  • To unlock these Hentai scenes, you have to date and gift items to the ladies to increase affection (hearts).

content_descriptors.notes:
The mature content in Luck Teacher includes explicit sexual content, 2D nudity, and sexual acts between male and female participants. There are oral, vaginal, anal, and penetrative/non-penetrative acts, bodily fluid, and sexual voice-dubbing.
In addition, there are fetish, toys, sexual language, and group sex.
There is no blood/gore or curses.
All characters are over 18 years old. All sexual acts are consensual
